h4.create (AKA channel_create) (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_create_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: channel_name (string)*
Create and join a new channel


h4.AcceptFriend (AKA Befriend) (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_AcceptFriend_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: friendHandleOrName (sentence)*
Accepts a friend request using "<name>" "@<chathandle>" or "<name>@<chathandle>" syntax


h4.Friend (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_Friend_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: friendHandleOrName (sentence)*
Adds a friend to your friends list using "<name>" "@<chathandle>" or "<name>@<chathandle>" syntax


h4.FriendComment (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_FriendComment_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: friendHandleOrName (string)*
*Parameter 2: pcComment (sentence)*
Adds a friend to your friends list using "<name>" "@<chathandle>" or "<name>@<chathandle>" syntax


h4.Ignore (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_Ignore_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: ignoreName (sentence)*
Ignore a player.


h4.Ignore_Spammer (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_Ignore_Spammer_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: ignoreName (sentence)*
ignore a player and mark them as a spammer


h4.RejectFriend (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_RejectFriend_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: friendHandleOrName (sentence)*
No comment provided

h4.RemoveFriend (AKA Unfriend) (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_RemoveFriend_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: friendHandleOrName (sentence)*
Removes a friend from your friends list using "<name>" "@<chathandle>" or "<name>@<chathandle>" syntax


h4.Unignore (AKA RemoveIgnore) (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_Unignore_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: ignoreName (sentence)*
Stop ignoring a player.


h4.Whitelist_Chat (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_Whitelist_Chat_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: enabled (int)*
Toggles the whitelist for all chat.  If enabled, you will only receive messages from friends, SG members, and Team members


h4.Whitelist_Emails (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_Whitelist_Emails_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: enabled (int)*
Toggles the whitelist for all chat.  If enabled, you will only receive emails from friends, SG members, and Team members


h4.Whitelist_Tells (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_Whitelist_Tells_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: enabled (int)*
Toggles the whitelist for all chat.  If enabled, you will only receive tells from friends, SG members, and Team members


h4.PrimaryMission (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_PrimaryMission_GameServerLib]
*Parameter 1: pcMissionDefName (string)*
*Parameter 2: bMakePrimary (bool)*
Offer this mission to other nearby members of your team and make it primary


h4.mission_ShareMissionCmd (AccessLevel 0) [Notes|Command_mission_ShareMissionCmd_GameServerLib]
